name: BK701D 700W Soldering Station, 2 In 1 Hot Air Rework & Soldering Iron Station, SMD ESD Safe Solder Station,Electronic Soldering Kit For Mobile Phone Laptop Repair or Circuit Board Soldering
short_description: 【2 in 1 Mmulti-functional Solder Station】 BAKON BK701D soldering iron station and hot air rework station can be worked independently, designed for soldering or desoldering project.This soldering iron kit suitable for a variety of components desoldering and soldering, such as: SOIC, CHIP, QEP, PLCC, BGA, SMD and so on ( Particularly suitable for mobile phone wiring and wiring seat desoldering), can also be used for heat shrinkage, drying, paint removal, de-sticking, defrosting, preheating, glue welding, etc..This precision soldering station is an essential tool for mobile phone repair, laptop repair or circuit board soldering, stained glass, jewellery tools, wood engraving machines

【 Electronics Soldering Kit】This soldering kit for professional electronic circuit rework includes 30g of soldering wire, 5 soldering tips (I/B/K/3.2D/3C), solder suction tape, brass cotton tip cleaner, desoldering pump, 1 tweezers, and 2 hot air nozzles. With this complete set of soldering tools, You can start welding immediately without buying additional accessories

【Precise Temperature Control】 The soldering iron adopts PID temperature control technology, which cycles every 20 milliseconds to detect the actual temperature of the iron's heating element and quickly corrects it to the correct set temperature to ensure the stability of the iron's temperature. The temperature of the soldering station can be adjusted from 212°F to 896°F with a maximum output power of 90W, and the temperature of the hot air gun can be adjusted from 212-932°F with a maximum output power of 700W.
【Auto Sleep】The digital soldering welding iron goes into sleep mode and cools down automatically after 10 minutes in the holder to extend the life of the heater core.

【After-Sales Service】 If have any problems while using this soldering kit for electronics, please feel free to contact us. The hot air workstation is covered by an exclusive 1-year product warranty in the U.S.A. Our technical support team will provide you with 24-hour support and consultation. NOTE: This product is rated for 110V US specification.

product_description: Product Description Weller transforms hand soldering. The art of hand soldering has been around for a very, very long time, thousands of years in fact. But it was only until 1941 that a transformer based instant heating soldering method was de­vel­oped by an im­pa­tient Amer­i­can radio re­pair­man who was tired of sit­ting around wait­ing for his sol­der­ing gun to heat up. Carl E. Weller had to wait until after WWII ended in 1945 to get his Weller Man­u­fac­tur­ing Company going. In 1960, the Weller Man­u­fac­tur­ing Co. in the US patented the “Magnate” sol­der­ing iron which used a mag­netic com­po­nent to reg­u­late the tem­per­a­ture at the iron’s tip. In an ex­pan­sion over­seas beginning in 1959, the Weller Elek­troWerkzeuge GmbH plant in Be­sigheim, Ger­many, along with new plants in other coun­tries, was or­ga­nized to man­u­fac­ture tem­per­a­ture con­trolled irons and sol­der­ing guns for pri­mar­ily in­dus­trial mar­kets through­out Eu­rope and the Near East. Keep­ing pace with the in­creas­ing com­plex­ity of our cus­tomers’ needs, Weller Ger­many be­came the mar­ket leader for de­vel­op­ing and man­u­fac­tur­ing hand soldering prod­ucts world­wide. Our prod­ucts were proudly em­bla­zoned with “Made in Ger­many”, sig­ni­fy­ing in­no­va­tion and re­li­a­bil­ity. From the Manufacturer Weller D650PK Industrial Gun and Kit produces the highest power output of all Weller soldering guns: 300 watts at the high range and 200 watts at the low range. This is a reliable industrial quality tool that will fit in any manufacturing setting.

name: Soldering Iron Kit for Stained Glass – Includes Hakko FX-601-02 (67W) Adjustable Temperature Soldering Iron, Amerway 60/40 1LB Solder, Tiger’s Eye Gel Flux 8oz & Flux Brush – Hobby & DIY Kit
short_description: ✔ 4-IN-ONE STAINED GLASS SOLDERING KIT – Get started with everything you need! This 4-in-1 premium kit includes the Hakko FX-601-02 soldering iron (67W, adjustable temperature), Amerway 60/40 Sapphire wire solder (1LB), Tiger’s Eye Gel Flux (8oz), and a Flux Brush for precise application.

✔ HAKKO FX-601 SOLDERING IRON – POWERFUL & LIGHTWEIGHT – Experience superior heat control with this 67W ceramic heating element, outperforming bulkier 100W irons. Features built-in adjustable temperature control (464-1004°F) for precise soldering. Comes with a Lock Key B3707 and a T19-D5 standard tip.

✔ AMERWAY 60/40 SAPPHIRE WIRE SOLDER – SMOOTH FLOW & STRONG BOND – The industry-favorite 60% tin / 40% lead alloy ensures seamless, smooth-flowing solder beads for perfect stained glass joints. Melting point: 372°F, solidifying at 361°F. Made in the USA for top-tier quality.

✔ TIGER’S EYE GEL FLUX – NON-CORROSIVE & EASY TO USE – Achieve clean solder seams with this non-smoking, odorless, gel-based flux that stays in place. No need for a flux neutralizer—simply clean up with water! Ideal for copper foil, lead, and zinc soldering applications.

✔ PRECISION FLUX BRUSH – MULTIPURPOSE & EASY APPLICATION – A simple yet effective brush for applying flux, glue, oil, or pastes. Designed for stained glass, electronics, arts, crafts, and PCB soldering, ensuring consistent and clean application every time.
product_description: Take your stained glass soldering to the next level with this high-quality Soldering Iron Kit, featuring the renowned Hakko FX 601-02 adjustable temperature soldering iron and essential tools for a smooth and professional finish. 🔹 Hakko FX601-02 Soldering Iron (67W, 120V) – Engineered for rapid thermal recovery and precision temperature control (464-1004°F), ensuring consistent, high-performance soldering without an external controller. Lightweight yet powerful, this iron is a must-have for stained glass artists and hobbyists. 🔹 Amerway 60/40 Sapphire Wire Solder (1LB) – Specially designed for stained glass work, this smooth-flowing alloy (60% tin, 40% lead) delivers superior solder joints. With a narrow pasty range, this solder guarantees clean and even bead formation. 🔹 Amerway Tiger’s Eye Gel Flux (8oz) – A non-corrosive, water-soluble gel flux that stays where you apply it, eliminating mess and ensuring strong, clean solder joints. Perfect for copper foil, lead, and zinc work. 🔹 Flux Brush – A simple yet essential tool for precise flux application. Works seamlessly for stained glass, PCB soldering, and DIY arts & crafts projects. Designed for stained glass artists, hobbyists, and DIY enthusiasts, this kit ensures professional-quality results with premium components from trusted brands. ✅ Perfect for: Stained glass projects, copper foil & lead soldering, DIY repairs, and hobby crafting. 🎁 GIFT-WORTHY FOR CREATIVES & DIY ENTHUSIASTS! – This premium soldering kit makes a thoughtful and practical gift for any craft lover. Ideal for: ✔ Christmas – A perfect holiday gift for stained glass artists & DIYers ✔ Father’s Day & Mother’s Day – Surprise a parent who loves hands-on hobbies ✔ Birthdays – A unique present for hobbyists & crafters ✔ Valentine’s Day – Gift for creative partners who love arts & crafts
